sentence.Network_en: Jocelyn : How about going snorkeling ? Surfing? Jet skiing? Kayaking? Banana boating?

sentence.Network_en: Snorkeling was amazing, daily seeing reef sharks, parrot fish and sting rays.
sentence.Network_cn: 浮潜很惊奇, 每天可以看到礁鲨, 鹦鹉鱼和魟鱼.

sentence.Network_en: Hillary and Robert are snorkeling near the Great Barrier Reef.
sentence.Network_cn: 希拉蕊和罗伯在大堡礁附近潜水.
